snippet: In “A Response to Dig Deep,” part of the festival Walls and Bridges, Arkadi Zaides performed a dance interpretation of Julia Wolfe’s composition at New York Live Arts.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by choreographer and dancer Arkadi Zaides at New York Live Arts as part of its Walls and Bridges festival.
lead_paragraph: In “A Response to Dig Deep,” part of the festival Walls and Bridges, Arkadi Zaides performed a dance interpretation of Julia Wolfe’s composition at New York Live Arts.

headline.seo: Arkadi Zaides Performs ‘A Response to Dig Deep’
headline.main: Dancing to His Tune, After the Music Stops
headline.print_headline: Dancing to His Tune, After the Music Stops
